FortiPass is a decentralised password management app. Built to securely store your sensitive information and safely synchronize it across your devices.

With the FortiPass extension, you can now save even more time signing in securely to websites. The extension includes a:
- tools for generating complex passwords;
- quick search within your vault information; and
- autofill capabilities for quickly accessing your saved sites.

For more great features visit our website to see what FortiPass can offer you.
